name: Xtreme Car Parking 3D
description:
Xtreame Car Parking – Car Parking 3D Simulator : 100 parking 3d levels, 16 cars: sport cars, super cars, offroad cars...

Cars: Each car is realistic with true 3D physics and amazing drifting, jumping, speed.

Car Parking 3D levels:
There are many levels, each of them is unique and gives possibilities to feel the car uniquely during each level. In levels with offroad car you will pass different obstacles, and when driving sport car in some levels you will have to drive very fast and do drifts, jumps. As this is car parking game, the goal of any level is to park the car in given position, but as this is not just another car parking simulator there are many interesting types of obstacles, hard ways, elevators, gates and more.

Game includes 3 type of controls: gyroscope, steering wheel, buttons.

Train your driving skills with this high quality and big simulator game by trying offroad car driving, sport car driving, feel super car experiences and bus driving.
